name: Superseeds Presents #3: Candlekeep
description:
Superseeds Presents bring characters, items and campaigns from the Superseeds column to fans everywhere.

 This third issue presents Mutants & Masterminds stats for Candlekeep, the soul-stealing undead from Superseeds #88. The file also includes the original column content, plus three brand new adventure seeds, making it six in total.

 Make your heroes tremble with the deadly power of Candlekeep!
